data.name: Skyquake
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

While scientists and sceptics argue as to what is causing the ominous sounds emanating from the sky known as Sky Quakes, Adam encounters the dark phenomenon and begins his own journey to find the source. As the mystery unfolds, he finds himself plagued by haunting dreams that turn into an even more terrifying reality. Pieces of a complex, otherworldly puzzle begin to fall into place as Adam falls apart and his friend Grace desperately tries to hold him together. Searching the Internet, she finds eyewitness video by others who have heard the sounds. This database becomes a list of victims, who have all gone missing after hearing the skyquakes. Fearing she and Adam are next, the search to find the source of the sounds becomes a race against time before it finds them. Beautifully shot and hauntingly moving, Skyquake is an edge of your seat thriller, based on real life events, that far exceeds its humble statistics. Sacrificing nothing, audiences will be shocked that it was shot in only 10 days. With a talented cast and crew of less than 20, and for a budget far under most features' catering costs, Skyquake is a true testament to what indie film is all about, keeping audiences talking well after the credits have rolled.

data.short_description: Since 2012 reports of strange sounds coming from the sky have flooded social media,now Adam, a recluse, struggling with his own demons, believes whatever is causing them has followed him home.
data.reviews:
“I enjoyed every minute and confess to ignoring a few calls from my phone until the film had ended.”
Hollywood North magazine

“a direction with a feeling for the somewhat out-of-place to add weirdness to the story without overpowering it and a solid cast - and you've got yourself a really nice little oddity!”
Search My Trash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
